markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Ruby Phoenix Fighting Roster](/Articles.aspx?ID=40)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 66</row>

There's no shortage of colorful characters for your players to encounter on their journey to claim the title of Ruby Phoenix Champions. Meet an unforgettable cast of friends and foes with this expansive roster!
name: Ruby Phoenix Fighting Roster
